data.text:
Eye of Ra

Grandmaster General of the International boards

Nov 15, 2008

18,802

5,118

Malm칬, Sweden

Jun 11, 2014

#1

Just for fun:

Lemiuex - Malkin - Jagr

Stevens - Crosby - Tocchet

Kessel - Francis - Recchi

H칬rnqvist - J.Staal - Sandstr칬m

Coffey - Murhpy

Letang - Samuelsson

Conchar - Orpik

Barasso

Fleury

(All in their prime)

How would this team do in todays NHL?

"How can you have him with ..." and "Why do you not pick ..." I look forward to a scary aha experience of having missed the big names that should have been included.

Feel free to make your own all-time team....

Last edited: Mar 6, 2018

#3

Vokoun in his prime > Fluery

Also Hossa over Kovalev

Vokoun didn't play for us when he was in his prime, he's only played 20 regular season games for us.

Hossa played 12 regular season games for us.

You's silly.

Also, I'm incredibly offended by the misspelling of Sergei Gonchar, as he is one of my favorite players.

#6

Dave Burrows for Kris Letang. Tocchet for Kovalev. I think Mullen might beat out Straka as well, but I can live with it since Straka's best years were here while Mullen - as good as he was as Penguin - his best years were in St. Louis and Calgary. Straka was here longer as well.

Paul Coffey - Larry Murphy

Ron Stackhouse - Randy Carlyle

Tom Barrasso

Marc-Andr츾춸 Fleury

How would this team do in todays NHL?

"How can you have him with ..." and "Why do you not pick ..." I look forward to a scary aha experience of having missed the big names that should have been included.

Feel free to make your own all-time team....

You must be very young. No way in hell does Mario take a back seat to Crosby. Mario is the first line Center. Crosby would be his wing.
